August 9, 1963
Dr. Earl Stevick
Foreign Service Institute
Department of State
1018 Wilson Boulevard
Arlington, Virginia
Dear Dr. Stevick:
Dr. Robert Goodell has indicated to us that you have expressed a willingeess
to examine the scripts which the N.A.E.B. and the Voice of America are
co-producing to make some comments and suggestions on the overall
approach and the specific ways in which various topics are handled.
The second draft of these scripts will be available shortly and it will
be our pleasure to send them along to you for reactions, if this mefets
with your approval.
We shall arrange to pay a $50 consulting fee per day for this kind of
analysis with the understanding that the complete review will take no longer
than two days.
We look forward to hearing from you to know if this arrangement will be
satisfactory.
Sincerely,
James A. Fellows
Assistant Director
